author: "Mackaile, Matthew, active 1657-1696"
title: "The diversitie of salts and spirits mantained [sic] or, The imaginary volatility of some salts and non-entity of the alcali ... by an onely lamp-furnace resolved into real improbability. By way of animadversions upon Dr. D[aniel] C[oxe] his 3 papers, comm"
